original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)🔽8.40. Cittasahabhūduka🔽Nacittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  cittasaha bhūduka  na citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca na citta sahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The Pairs in Direct-Order with Consciousness
